statements: SELECT project_name, completion_percentage FROM ProjectProgress WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT * FROM ProjectProgress WHERE completion_percentage > 50
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectProgress ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProjectProgress WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT project_name, completion_percentage FROM ProjectProgress ORDER BY completion_percentage ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, completion_percentage FROM ProjectProgress WHERE completion_percentage >= 50 ORDER BY completion_percentage DESC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectProgress WHERE project_name LIKE '%development%'
SELECT * FROM ProjectProgress WHERE DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) > 30 ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, completion_percentage FROM ProjectProgress WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY completion_percentage DESC
SELECT project_name, completion_percentage FROM ProjectProgress WHERE completion_percentage BETWEEN 25 AND 75 ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE completion_percentage > 50;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, completion_percentage FROM projects ORDER BY completion_percentage DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE completion_percentage > 50 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, end_date, completion_percentage FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND completion_percentage < 100 ORDER BY completion_percentage ASC;
SELECT task_name, deadline, status FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 3 AND status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY deadline;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY start_date, completion_percentage DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM projects LEFT JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_tasks > 5 ORDER BY total_tasks DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_percentage FROM projects;
SELECT task_name, due_date, completion_status FROM tasks WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources ORDER BY resource_type DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE completion_percentage > 50 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT task_name, due_date, completion_status FROM tasks JOIN projects ON tasks.project_id = projects.project_id WHERE projects.project_name = 'Project X'
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT project_name, completion_percentage FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY completion_percentage DESC
SELECT task_name, due_date, completion_status FROM tasks WHERE due_date < CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT * FROM Project ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE completion_percentage > 50;
SELECT task_name, due_date, assigned_to FROM Task WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT member_name, team_role FROM TeamMember WHERE team_role = 'Developer';
SELECT log_date, log_content FROM TaskLog ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE completion_percentage > 50;
SELECT task_name, due_date, completion_status FROM Task WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT member_name, team_role FROM TeamMember WHERE team_role = 'Developer' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT log_date, log_content FROM TaskLog ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_table;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_table WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT project_id, project_name, task_name FROM project_table JOIN tasks_table ON project_table.project_id = tasks_table.project_id;
SELECT * FROM task_progress WHERE percentage_completed > 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(team_id) AS total_team_members FROM project_team GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_table WHERE status='Active';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_table WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks_table WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, status FROM tasks_table WHERE project_id = 2 AND status='In Progress';
SELECT project_id, COUNT(team_id) AS team_size FROM project_team GROUP BY project_id HAVING team_size > 3 ORDER BY team_size DESC;
